issue.title: Move plugins into their own project

content.raw:
@scpeters , my understanding is that it is suitable for example in the case of `ign-rendering`, where there is a some core functionality, and other components like `ign-rendering-ogre` and `ign-rendering-optix` would extend that. `ign-math-eigen` also seems to fall into this category for me.

I think the main difference here is that there isn't really an `ign-common` core which ties all the other components together.
